item.title: Call for Customized Conversation-Customized Conversation Grounding Persona and Knowledge
item.description: Abstarct Humans usually have conversations by making use of prior knowledge about a topic and background information of the people whom they are talking to.

item.title: GLUCOSE:Â GeneraLized andÂ COntextualized Story Explanations
item.description: [!info] Reference Nasrin Mostafazadeh, Aditya Kalyanpur, Lori Moon, David Buchanan, Lauren Berkowitz, Or Biran, and Jennifer Chu-Carroll. 2020.Â GLUCOSE: GeneraLized and COntextualized Story Explanations.

item.title: On Cross-Dataset Generalization in Automatic Detection of Online Abuse
item.description: [!info] Reference Nejadgholi, I., & Kiritchenko, S. (2020). On cross-dataset generalization in automatic detection of online abuse.Â arXiv preprint arXiv:2010.

item.title: Towards generalisable hate speech detection
item.description: [!info] Reference Yin, W., & Zubiaga, A. (2021). Towards generalisable hate speech detection: a review on obstacles and solutions.Â PeerJ Computer Science,Â 7, e598.
